intro: Spermacoce divergens, commonly known as the African nightshade, is a flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to Africa and thrives in tropical and subtropical regions. The plant features small, white or pale yellow flowers that are clustered in umbels. Its fruits are small, dry capsules that contain several seeds. Spermacoce divergens is often found in disturbed soils and is used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
